name: BINGO POPPIDOPPOLOUS' PINBALL-GOLF PARADISE
description:
# Bingo Poppidoppolous' Pinball-Golf Paradise

Welcome to Paradise! Can you take on Bingo's pinball challenge?

I made this game in two-ish days for #LudwigJam. It is inspired by the unforgiving "Foddian" theme, one that I think well suits the emotions of pinball.

A hole-in-one route exists, but it's very hard.

I hope you enjoy!
